item.description:
Do you love your sweets as much as I do? Then, you will love this event!

Bring 3 dozen holiday cookies (vegan, one variety), socialize & share with other bakers, and go home with lots of vegan cookies (all different varieties). I will provide beverages. Please bring a recipe card of your cookies as well, to share!

Location - Laura's home in Framingham - call for address (508-405-1551).
item.name: Vegan Holiday Cookie Swap
